title: Timor-Leste
summary: Timor-Leste is a country in South-Eastern Asia. The capital is Dili. Population: 1.4 million. Area: 14,874 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Timor-Leste has a red field with two isosceles triangles which share a common base on the hoist end. The smaller black triangle, which bears a five-pointed white star at its center and spans one-third the width of the field, is superimposed on the larger yellow triangle that extends to the center of the field.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
